Spatial Data Science with R Chapter 1 Preface

Spatial Data Science with R Edzer Pebesma and Roger Bivand 2018-03-13 Chapter 1 Preface library(sf) ## Loading required package: methods ## Linking to GEOS 3.5.1, GDAL 2.2.1, proj.4 4.9.3 # devtools::install_github("r-spatial/sf") library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.2.1 ── ## ✔ ggplot2 2.2.1.9000 ✔ purrr 0.2.4 ## ✔ tibble 1.4.2 ✔ dplyr 0.7.4 ## ✔ tidyr 0.8.0 ✔ stringr 1.3.0 ## ✔ readr 1.1.1 ✔ forcats 0.2.0 ## ── Conflicts ───────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## ✖ dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() read_sf(system.file("gpkg/nc.gpkg", package="sf")) %>% select(NWBIR74) %>% plot
